full_text: /1@/0 INSTRUCTIONS TO THE APPLICANT Application should be executed and SIGNED in duplicate and submitted to the Immigration and Naturalization Service office shown on the reverse hereof. A fee of three dollars ($3) must accompany the application. All remittances should be made payable to "Immigration and Naturalization Service, Department of Justice," except in Guam they should be made payable to "Treasurer of Guam" and in the Virgin Islands to "Commissioner of Finance, Virgin Islands." If you mail this application, attach money order or check. DO NOT SEND CASH.
